articles.description: Ayan Mukerji, known for his cinematic flair, took his skills off-screen by orchestrating a real-life crossover event that brought together the stars of his films for a casual evening out.
articles.content:

articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Diljit Dosanjh drops emotional post after creating history in Vancouver: ‘If it wasn’t His wish, no one would have come to my show’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Diljit Dosanjh, who scripted history at BC Place stadium, in Vancouver, took to his social media handle to express his gratitude.
articles.content: Earlier this month, when Diljit Dosanjh performed in Mumbai to a packed stadium, he promised that his upcoming Vancouver Tour, Dil-Luminati, would be a memorable one. True to his word, the performanc… [+3085 chars]
